title: Discontent Idealist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player at night to complain to about another 3 other players. They will be roleblocked if they visit that player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you vote, your ability is taken away.

desc:

*complains about stuff*
*doesn't vote to change it*
